details.quote: You get lazy, you get sad. Start givin' up. Plain and simple.
details.author: James Dashner

details.quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
details.author: Voltaire

details.quote: Plan your work for today and every day, then work your plan.
details.author: Margaret Thatcher

details.quote: Who you are tomorrow begins with what you do today.
details.author: Tim Fargo

details.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
details.author: Albert Einstein

details.quote: Sheer effort enables those with nothing to surpass those with priviledge and position.
details.author: Toyotomi Hideyoshi

details.quote: The average person puts only 25% of his energy and ability into his work.
details.author: Andrew Carnegie
